summary: Completed comprehensive testing of IT Inventory System. Backend API is highly functional (97.1% success rate) with all major features working. Frontend has authentication and basic navigation working but has React runtime errors affecting some components.

minor_bugs.issue: Expects status in request body instead of query parameter

ui_bugs.issue: Runtime errors: 'Objects are not valid as a React child' - likely form validation errors being rendered directly
Select.Item components have empty string values causing validation errors

integration_issues.issue: Some navigation links fail due to React errors, preventing access to Equipment page

passed_tests: Companies CRUD operations (34/35 backend tests passed)

success_percentage.frontend: 60% (login, dashboard, companies work; equipment page fails)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix React runtime errors: 1) Resolve 'Objects are not valid as a React child' errors in form components, 2) Fix Select.Item components with empty string values, 3) Ensure proper error handling in API response rendering
